resources.string: Volume of data downloaded during peak times
Volume of data downloaded and uploaded during both peak and off-peak times

When your upload and off peak download volume is consumed fully, you can use peak download volume quota for upload and off peak downloads. Then such volume is deducted from peak download volume and shown as tranferred volume.
This application is create by Prasanna Deshappriya. Contact prasannadeshappriya@gmail.com for more informations.
